sections.title: Background
sections.content: I'm a multidisciplinary designer and developer with a passion for creating digital experiences that combine thoughtful design with robust engineering. My journey started in traditional graphic design, but I quickly found myself drawn to the limitless possibilities of web development.

sections.title: Approach
sections.content: I believe the best products are built when design and development work hand in hand from the start. Every project I work on is an opportunity to push boundaries, experiment with new techniques, and create something meaningful.

sections.title: Current Focus
sections.content: I'm currently exploring the intersection of AI, design systems, and interactive storytelling. I'm fascinated by how emerging technologies can enhance human creativity and communication.
